original_title: Only Love Can Do This to Me
overview: The doctor of physics, Chen Ding, couldn't figure out. After talking about his first girlfriend for five years, why did he suddenly break up and decided to rush away thousands of miles to save it. He happened to meet Xiao Wei, an ancient Chinese girl. A car, two people, five days together, the invasion of handsome backpacker Johnson made the journey even more thrilling. Chen Ding and Xiao Wei gradually became acquainted with each other as they became accustomed to each other. At this moment, Chen Ding met his girlfriend ...
title: Only Love Can Do This to Me
